name: Latkes
description: These crisp potato pancakes are the ultimate in holiday comfort food. (Don’t skip the sour cream and applesauce!) Get them sizzling away in a heavy-bottomed skillet until beautifully browned, and arrange them on a plate lined with paper towels as they finish. They won’t last long.

recipeInstructions.text:
To the grated potatoes, add 1
grated onion, 2 lightly beaten eggs
and 2 tablespoons breadcrumbs
(or matzo meal); substitute neutral
oil for butter. (Be liberal with the
oil.)

Spoon the mixture into the oil
to form pancakes; fry until brown
and crisp on both sides.

Serve with
sour cream and applesauce.
